name: Jeffrey R. FERGUSON, applicant, v. George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Jeffrey R. FERGUSON, applicant,
v.
George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections.
attorneys: Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the Court denied.
Justice GINSBURG, Justice BREYER, Justice SOTOMAYOR, and Justice KAGAN would grant the application for stay of execution.
casebody.head_matter:
Jeffrey R. FERGUSON, applicant,
v.
George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections.
No. 13A965.
Supreme Court of the United States
March 25, 2014.
Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the Court denied.
Justice GINSBURG, Justice BREYER, Justice SOTOMAYOR, and Justice KAGAN would grant the application for stay of execution.
